# Label Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| P | `app-label p` |
| H1 | `app-label h1` |
| H2 | `app-label h2` |
| H3 | `app-label h3` |
| H4 | `app-label h4` |
| H5 | `app-label h5` |
| H6 | `app-label h6` |

---

## Appearance: Text

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Primary | `app-label text-primary` |
| Secondary | `app-label text-secondary` |
| Tertiary | `app-label text-tertiary` |
| Success | `app-label text-success` |
| Warning | `app-label text-warning` |
| Danger | `app-label text-danger` |
| Info | `app-label text-info` |
| Muted | `app-label text-muted` |

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
